recipe.title: Strawberry and Peach Sangria
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups Essensia (orange Muscat, a sweet dessert wine)
1 large orange, cut crosswise into 6 slices
1 large lemon, cut crosswise into 6 slices
instructions: Mix white wine, Essensia, strawberries, peach liqueur, peaches, orange slices, lemon slices, and strawberry syrup in large pitcher, smashing citrus slices slightly. Let stand at room temperature at least 2 hours or chill up to 4 hours. Serve sangria over ice.
